channel.title: Mining essecence!
channel.description:
OK, well i have a 317 delta based server, and i was mining ess and i realized that you have to click everytime to get 1... and its slow so..
I would like to know how so i can click once and it goes full till full inv, and how to speed up the rate of ess you get. Thanks! :))
